channel.title: CVE Feed for Pivotal -- Spring AMQP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pivotal -- Spring AMQP

item.title: CVE-2018-11087|2024-09-17T03:58:41.663Z -- pivotal -- spring%20amqp
item.description: Pivotal Spring AMQP, 1.x versions prior to 1.7.10 and 2.x versions prior to 2.0.6, expose a man-in-the-middle vulnerability due to lack of hostname validation. A malicious user that has the ability to intercept traffic would be able to view data in transit.
